32 void BackwardLocalPlanner::initialize(std::string name, tf2_ros::Buffer* tf, costmap_2d::Costmap2DROS* costmap_ros)

38 void BackwardLocalPlanner::initialize()
39 {
40  k_rho_ = -1.0;
41  k_alpha_ = 0.5;
42  k_betta_ = -1.0; // set to zero means that orientation is not important
43  carrot_angular_distance_ = 0.5;
44 
45  f = boost::bind(&BackwardLocalPlanner::reconfigCB, this, _1, _2);
46  paramServer_.setCallback(f);
47  this->currentPoseIndex_ = 0;
48 
49 
50  ros::NodeHandle nh("~/BackwardLocalPlanner");
51  nh.param("pure_spinning_straight_line_mode", pureSpinningMode_, true);
52  nh.param("yaw_goal_tolerance", yaw_goal_tolerance_, 0.05);
53  nh.param("xy_goal_tolerance", xy_goal_tolerance_, 0.10);
54  nh.param("k_rho", k_rho_,k_rho_);
55  nh.param("carrot_distance", carrot_distance_, carrot_distance_);
56  nh.param("carrot_angular_distance", carrot_angular_distance_, carrot_angular_distance_);
57 
58  nh.param("max_linear_x_speed", max_linear_x_speed_, 1.0);
59  nh.param("max_angular_z_speed", max_angular_z_speed_, 2.0);
60 
61  goalMarkerPublisher_ = nh.advertise<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>("goal_marker", 1);
62 }
63

71  this->costmapRos_ = costmap_ros;
72  this->initialize();

80 bool BackwardLocalPlanner::createCarrotGoal(const tf::Stamped<tf::Pose>& tfpose)
81 {
82  bool ok = false;
83  bool pureSpinning=false;
84 
85  double angle = tf::getYaw(tfpose.getRotation());
86 
87  if(!pureSpinningMode_)
88  {
89  if(currentPoseIndex_<=1)
90  {
91  double angle = tf::getYaw(tfpose.getRotation());
92 
93  /*
94  //closest dist
95  double mindist = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
96  int closestIndex = 1;
97  for(int i=1;i< backwardsPlanPath_.size();i++)
98  {
99  auto& pose = backwardsPlanPath_[i];
100  const geometry_msgs::Point& p = pose.pose.position;
101 
102  // take error from the current position to the path point
103  double dx = p.x - tfpose.getOrigin().x();
104  double dy = p.y - tfpose.getOrigin().y();
105  double dist = sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
106 
107  if(dist < mindist)
108  {
109  closestIndex = i;
110  mindist = dist;
111  }
112  }*/
113 
114  auto& closestPose = backwardsPlanPath_[1];
115  tf::Quaternion q;
116  tf::quaternionMsgToTF(closestPose.pose.orientation, q);
117  double pangle = tf::getYaw(q);
118  double angular_error = angles::shortest_angular_distance(pangle, angle);
119 
120  ROS_WARN("pure spinning stage, angle: %lf threshold: %lf", angular_error, carrot_angular_distance_);
121 
122  if(fabs(angular_error) >= carrot_angular_distance_)
123  {
124  ok = true;
125  currentPoseIndex_ = 1;
126  pureSpinning=true;
127  initialPureSpinningStage_=true;
128  }
129  else
130  {
131  ok = true;
132  currentPoseIndex_++;
133  initialPureSpinningStage_=false;
134  pureSpinning=false;
135  //exit(0);
136  }
137  }
138  }
139 
140  if(!pureSpinning)
141  {
142  pureSpinning = false;
143 
144  // iterate the point from the current position and backward until reaching a new goal point in the path
145  for (; !ok && currentPoseIndex_ < backwardsPlanPath_.size(); currentPoseIndex_++)
146  {
147  auto& pose = backwardsPlanPath_[currentPoseIndex_];
148  const geometry_msgs::Point& p = pose.pose.position;
149  tf::Quaternion q;
150  tf::quaternionMsgToTF(pose.pose.orientation, q);
151 
152  // take error from the current position to the path point
153  double dx = p.x - tfpose.getOrigin().x();
154  double dy = p.y - tfpose.getOrigin().y();
155  double dist = sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
156 
157  double pangle = tf::getYaw(q);
158  double angular_error = angles::shortest_angular_distance(pangle + alpha_offset_, angle);
159 
160  // target pose found
161  if (dist >= carrot_distance_ )
162  {
163  ok = true;
164  ROS_INFO("target dist: %lf / %lf", dist, carrot_distance_);
165  ROS_INFO("Retracting: %lf/100", 100.0 * currentPoseIndex_ / (double)backwardsPlanPath_.size());
166  currentPoseIndex_--;
167  }
168  }
169  }
170 
171  if (currentPoseIndex_ >= backwardsPlanPath_.size())
172  {
173  currentPoseIndex_ = backwardsPlanPath_.size() -1;
174  ok = true;
175  }
176 
177  ROS_INFO("current index: %d", currentPoseIndex_);
178 
179  return pureSpinning;
180 }
181 
187 void BackwardLocalPlanner::defaultBackwardCmd(const tf::Stamped<tf::Pose>& tfpose, double vetta, double gamma, double alpha_error, geometry_msgs::Twist& cmd_vel)
188 {
189  cmd_vel.linear.x = vetta;
190  cmd_vel.angular.z = gamma;
191 
192  auto& finalgoal = backwardsPlanPath_.back();
193  double gdx = finalgoal.pose.position.x - tfpose.getOrigin().x();
194  double gdy = finalgoal.pose.position.y - tfpose.getOrigin().y();
195  double goaldist = sqrt(gdx*gdx + gdy*gdy);
196 
197  if(goaldist < this->xy_goal_tolerance_ && alpha_error < this->yaw_goal_tolerance_) // 5cm
198  {
199  goalReached_=true;
200  backwardsPlanPath_.clear();
201  }
202 }
208 void BackwardLocalPlanner::pureSpinningCmd(const tf::Stamped<tf::Pose>& tfpose, double vetta, double gamma, double alpha_error, double betta_error, double rho_error, geometry_msgs::Twist& cmd_vel)
209 {
210  if (rho_error > 0.02)
211  {
212  vetta = k_rho_ * rho_error;
213  gamma = k_alpha_ * alpha_error;
214  }
215  else if (fabs(betta_error) >= 0.01)
216  {
217  vetta = 0;
218  gamma = k_betta_*betta_error;
219  }
220  else if (currentPoseIndex_ >= backwardsPlanPath_.size() - 1)
221  {
222  vetta = 0;
223  gamma = 0;
224  goalReached_=true;
225  ROS_INFO_STREAM("BACKWARD LOCAL PLANNER END: rhoerror: " << rho_error);
226  }
227 
228  cmd_vel.linear.x = vetta;
229  cmd_vel.angular.z = gamma;
230 }

233 #if ROS_VERSION_MINIMUM(1,13,0)
234 tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> optionalRobotPose(costmap_2d::Costmap2DROS* costmapRos)
235 {
236  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped paux;
237  costmapRos->getRobotPose(paux);
238  tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> tfpose;
239  tf::poseStampedMsgToTF(paux, tfpose);
240  return tfpose;
241 }
242 #else
243 // INDIGO AND PREVIOUS
244 tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> optionalRobotPose( costmap_2d::Costmap2DROS* costmapRos)
245 {
246  tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> tfpose;
247  costmapRos->getRobotPose(tfpose);
248  return tfpose;
249 }
250 
251 #endif

258 bool BackwardLocalPlanner::computeVelocityCommands(geometry_msgs::Twist& cmd_vel)
259 {
260  ROS_DEBUG("LOCAL PLANNER LOOP");
261 
262  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped paux;
263  tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> tfpose = optionalRobotPose(costmapRos_);
264 
265  tf::Quaternion q = tfpose.getRotation();
266 
267  bool initialPureSpinningDefaultMovement = createCarrotGoal(tfpose);
268 
269  const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& goalpose = backwardsPlanPath_[currentPoseIndex_];
270  ROS_INFO_STREAM("goal pose current index: " << goalpose);
271  const geometry_msgs::Point& goalposition = goalpose.pose.position;
272 
273  tf::Quaternion goalQ;
274  tf::quaternionMsgToTF(goalpose.pose.orientation, goalQ);
275 
276  //goal orientation (global frame)
277  double betta = tf::getYaw(goalQ);
278  betta = betta + betta_offset_;
279 
280  double dx = goalposition.x - tfpose.getOrigin().x();
281  double dy = goalposition.y - tfpose.getOrigin().y();
282 
283  //distance error to the targetpoint
284  double rho_error = sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
285 
286  //heading to goal angle
287  double theta = tf::getYaw(q);
288  double alpha = atan2(dy, dx);
289  alpha = alpha + alpha_offset_;
290 
291  double alpha_error = angles::shortest_angular_distance(alpha, theta);
292  double betta_error = angles::shortest_angular_distance(betta, theta);
293 
294  double vetta = k_rho_ * rho_error;
295  double gamma = k_alpha_ * alpha_error + k_betta_ * betta_error;
296 
297  if (pureSpinningMode_)
298  {
299  this->pureSpinningCmd(tfpose,vetta,gamma, alpha_error, betta_error, rho_error, cmd_vel);
300  }
301  else
302  {
303  // this is recomendable to start the initial motion looking to the goal
304 
305  ROS_WARN("pure spinning: %d", initialPureSpinningDefaultMovement);
306  if(initialPureSpinningDefaultMovement)
307  {
308  vetta = 0;
309  }
310 
311 
312  this->defaultBackwardCmd(tfpose, vetta,gamma, alpha_error, cmd_vel);
313  }
314 
315 
316 
317  if (cmd_vel.linear.x > max_linear_x_speed_)
318  {
319  cmd_vel.linear.x = max_linear_x_speed_;
320  }
321  else if(cmd_vel.linear.x < -max_linear_x_speed_)
322  {
323  cmd_vel.linear.x = -max_linear_x_speed_;
324  }
325 
326  if(cmd_vel.angular.z > max_angular_z_speed_)
327  {
328  cmd_vel.angular.z = max_angular_z_speed_;
329  }
330  else if(cmd_vel.angular.z < -max_angular_z_speed_)
331  {
332  cmd_vel.angular.z = - max_angular_z_speed_;
333  }
334 
335  publishGoalMarker(goalposition.x, goalposition.y, betta);
336 
337  ROS_INFO_STREAM("local planner," << std::endl
338  << " pureSpiningMode: "<< pureSpinningMode_ <<std::endl
339  << " theta: " << theta << std::endl
340  << " betta: " << theta << std::endl
341  << " err_x: " << dx << std::endl
342  << " err_y:" << dy << std::endl
343  << " rho_error:" << rho_error << std::endl
344  << " alpha_error:" << alpha_error << std::endl
345  << " betta_error:" << betta_error << std::endl
346  << " vetta:" << vetta << std::endl
347  << " gamma:" << gamma);
348 
349  //cmd_vel.linear.x=0;
350  //cmd_vel.angular.z = 0;
351 
352  return true;
353 }

360 void BackwardLocalPlanner::reconfigCB(backward_local_planner::BackwardLocalPlannerConfig& config, uint32_t level)
361 {
362  ROS_INFO("Reconfigure Request");
363  k_alpha_ = config.k_alpha;
364  k_betta_ = config.k_betta;
365  k_rho_ = config.k_rho;
366 
367  //alpha_offset_ = config.alpha_offset;
368  //betta_offset_ = config.betta_offset;
369 
370  carrot_distance_ = config.carrot_distance;
371  carrot_angular_distance_ = config.carrot_angular_distance;
372 }

379 bool BackwardLocalPlanner::isGoalReached()

389 bool BackwardLocalPlanner::setPlan(const std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& plan)
390 {
391  initialPureSpinningStage_=true;
392  goalReached_ = false;
393  backwardsPlanPath_ = plan;
394  /*
395  std::stringstream ss;
396 
397  for(auto& p: plan)
398  {
399  ss << p;
400  }
401  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Backward Local Planner - plan path - " << ss.str());
402  */
403  return true;
404 }

411 void BackwardLocalPlanner::publishGoalMarker(double x, double y, double phi)
412 {
413  visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
414  marker.header.frame_id = "/odom";
415  marker.header.stamp = ros::Time::now ();
416 
417  marker.ns = "my_namespace2";
418  marker.id = 0;
419  marker.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::ARROW;
420  marker.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
421 
422  marker.scale.x = 0.05;
423  marker.scale.y = 0.15;
424  marker.scale.z = 0.05;
425  marker.color.a = 1.0;
426 
427  marker.color.r = 1;
428  marker.color.g = 0;
429  marker.color.b = 0;
430 
431  geometry_msgs::Point start,end;
432  start.x = x;
433  start.y = y;
434 
435  end.x = x + 0.5 * cos(phi);
436  end.y = y + 0.5 * sin(phi);
437 
438  marker.points.push_back(start);
439  marker.points.push_back(end);
440 
441  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray ma;
442  ma.markers.push_back(marker);
443 
444  goalMarkerPublisher_.publish(ma);
445 }
446 }
